sessionStickinessConfig.description: Session stickiness provides the ability to define multiple requests from a single viewer as a single session. This prevents the potentially inconsistent experience of sending some of a given user's requests to the staging distribution, while others are sent to the primary distribution. Define the session duration using TTL values. See `session_stickiness_config`.

weight.description: The percentage of traffic to send to a staging distribution, expressed as a decimal number between `0` and `.15`.
